item.description:
Follow the Balance Rock Trail to Semuhanna Tr. to Old Indian Tr to Summit
Return down Mountain House Tr. to Loop Tr. to Bicentennial follow a short portion of the Auto road to Donbrowo Tr. to Ski Area join the Old Indian Tr. return to parking Area. 5 mile hike passes by Bolton Pond, Balance Rock up to the new Fire Tower. Nice hike through wooded area. Steep at times. Donbrowo Tr. is a secluded trail not many know of shadows Mile Hill Rd. down to the ski area.


Parking has been changed to the Wachusett Mtn. Ski Area parking Area. The Entrance is at the beginning of Bolton Rd. off Mile HillÂ Rd. The Trail head, The Balance Rock Tr. is located half way down the parking lot on the right.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Wachusett Mtn. Hike
